channel.title: Scams on S4NKALP | Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Scams on S4NKALP | Blog

item.title: Planning To Go Abroad?
item.description: Are you planning to go abroad? Beware of these scams!! Source : Reddit There are common scams running in Nepal for those going abroad. All done through informal channel so take these information to be aware. Females goes on dependent with Male as Student: Women got together with male in abroad with a promise to work and pay the men’s uni fee. In the middle of the study they file divorce.
